CLJ Art Collective <3*

* pronounced “with a heart”

We are a learners group and programmer collective.
On Mondays we play around with

  • Clojure/Clojurescript
  • Music
  • Animation
  • and everything that comes to our mind.

ClojureBridge

Currently we are planning the ClojureBridge Berlin! Which is a free, beginner-friendly Clojure programming workshop for women.

Sign up for coaching!
